mapper.insert: insert into user_info (id, `name`, gender, age, telphone, register_mode, third_party_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdPartyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user_info set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_mode = #{registerMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, third_party_id = #{thirdPartyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, gender, age, telphone, register_mode, third_party_id from user_info
